I’m a UX/UI designer who creates meaningful digital experiences by blending analytical thinking with visual storytelling. My expertise spans the entire product lifecycle, from strategic design and user interface development to implementing production-ready products. I’m also passionate about micro-interactions and digital accessibility (WCAG), ensuring every solution is comprehensive and user-friendly.

I leverage design best practices to drive strategic thinking and make informed decisions that elevate every project. My goal is to create intuitive, accessible, and impactful digital experiences that not only resonate with users but also meet business objectives.

My journey into design was anything but linear. I’ve always been driven by curiosity, whether it was exploring colors with crayons as a kid or diving into the structured world of engineering. It was this unique blend of creativity and logic that ultimately led me to UX/UI design.

My passion truly ignited during a moment of self-discovery, starting with graphic design and building a strong foundation in visual aesthetics. This soon evolved into a deep love for digital design—my true calling. Today, I'm proud of the unique path that shaped my approach to design and allows me to see challenges from multiple perspectives.
